exits.description: grasslands to the north.
forest to the east.
you are just outside of your home cave.
grasslands continue to stretch to the west

description: you are just outside of your home. the others still slumber inside.
investigationDescription: your home is familiar now after many nights of living here. was it luck or something else that brought you all here in your time of need?

exits.description: grasslands to the north.
forest to the east.
you are just outside of your home cave.
grasslands continue to stretch to the west

description: you are just outside of your home. the day is bright and full of promise.
investigationDescription: your home is familiar now after many nights of living here, but you will not find food here.

description: you are just outside of your home. you do not look forward to sharing word of your failed hunt with the others.
investigationDescription: your home is familiar now after many nights of living here, but you will not find food here.

exits.description: grasslands to the north.
forest to the east.
you are just outside of your home cave.
grasslands continue to stretch to the west

description: you are just outside of your home. you feel a bitter twist in your gut, a mix of hunger and shame.
investigationDescription: there is nothing to do now but bring what little food you have to the others, and yet you linger outside a moment, not wanting to bring disappointment.

exits.description: you are just outside of your home cave.
grasslands continue to stretch to the west. you see a faint glow coming from this direction.

description: you are just outside of your home. it is dangerous to leave at night, but...
investigationDescription: the glow from the west captures your attention.

exits.description: grasslands to the north.
forest to the east.
you are just outside of your home cave.
grasslands continue to stretch to the west.

description: you are just outside of your home. you feel a bit strange for leaving so far from home in the middle of the night, but you are glad to be back safely.
investigationDescription: the entrance to your cave is shadowed by the small tree that stands outside.

exits.description: grasslands to the north.
forest to the east.
you are just outside of your home cave.
grasslands continue to stretch to the west.

description: you are just outside of your home. yesterday's failures are behind you - today must bring a successful hunt.
investigationDescription: the familiarity of home does not bring its normal comfort to you. instead, you feel only a swell of determination that contrasts with the hunger in your gut.

exits.description: grasslands to the north.
forest to the east.. the bear's scent somehow drifts on the wind.
you are just outside of your home cave..
grasslands continue to stretch to the west.

description: you walk outside with spear in hand, orb tied to your waist with animal hide. you feel a rush through your body, originating from the orb, and the world around you intensifies. your instincts and your senses come alive in a way unlike you have ever felt before. the bear... is somewhere to the east. you can smell it. <color=purple>it will not be a match for you today.</color>
investigationDescription: you are consumed by a thrill for the hunt. your prey lies east of here, it is all your mind will hold.

description: nearly home now. relief, excitement fill you. you will show the spoils of a successful hunt.
investigationDescription: you are outside of your home. it has been some time since you were here with such hope in you.

description: just outside of home. Tei must have went towards the forest in search of wood.
investigationDescription: you cannot track one like you. you search for a trail but see none.

description: the wind stirs just outside of your cave. you can just see a darker sky in the west.
investigationDescription: Tei wants to go to your usual place. they will not go east, frightened by the forest from last night.
